alert.note: Alert for Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 3:55PM CDT until April 10 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hamilton, or 8 miles northeast of Eureka, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton and Virgil. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
